org.qbroker.net

Class JedisConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.net.JedisConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connector

    public class JedisConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connector
    JedisConnector connects to a Redis server and provides the following methods for Redis operations: set(), get(), zcadd, rpush, lpop, publish and list(). But it does not support synchronous subscribe.

    This is NOT MT-Safe. Therefore, you need to use multiple instances to achieve your MT-Safty goal.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
